nodes.documentation:
@author Brecht Devos - <brecht@loopring.org>
 @title IBurnRateTable - A contract for managing burn rates for tokens
nodes.name: IBurnRateTable
getBurnRate
getTokenTier
upgradeTokenTier

devdoc.author: Brecht Devos - <brecht@loopring.org>

getBurnRate(address).details: Returns the P2P and matching burn rate for the token.

params.token: The token to get the burn rate for.

getBurnRate(address).return: The burn rate. The P2P burn rate and matching burn rate         are packed together in the lowest 4 bytes.         (2 bytes P2P, 2 bytes matching)

getTokenTier(address).details: Returns the tier of a token.

params.token: The token to get the token tier for.

upgradeTokenTier(address).details: Upgrades the tier of a token. Before calling this function,        msg.sender needs to approve this contract for the neccessary funds.

params.token: The token to upgrade the tier for.

devdoc.title: IBurnRateTable - A contract for managing burn rates for tokens
